backend/main.mo: Defines user, partner, client, layanan, task, ticket, and withdraw types with in-memory maps plus authorization, and exposes profile and ticket management methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing the InternalLogin page requirement for a conditional Claim Superadmin UI tied to backend calls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, detailing routing, components, styling, and feature behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions setting OKLCH color variables, radius, and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all client, partner, internal, and landing routes plus a custom 404 page.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Footer with logo and a single copyright line.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Sticky header with desktop/mobile logos and navigation buttons for Masuk, Mulai, and Partner.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Hero section with hero image, headline text, CTA to scroll to layanan, and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Section inviting users to join the team with a button navigating to partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Landing page component with hero content, scroll-to-section behavior, and service phase descriptions.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Exports structured layananData defining service tiers, descriptions, pricing, and benefits.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Renders an accordion list of services using layananData with pricing, details, and WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Simple closing section displaying a short reassurance message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login flow, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Admin dashboard with tabbed placeholder sections and basic header/footer layout.
frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDa: Dashboard untuk asisten dengan ringkasan task dan tab navigasi, termasuk form internal seperti partner, jam efektif, dan scope.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Dashboard client menampilkan ringkasan task, catatan pribadi, dan beberapa tab pengelolaan layanan serta progres.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: Halaman login client dengan tombol login simulasi, akses ruang kerja, dan navigasi ke pendaftaran.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Form pendaftaran client dengan input dasar dan tampilan konfirmasi setelah submit.
frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDa: Dashboard concierge dengan beberapa tab seperti pencarian, tiket, dan handling, semuanya placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashbo: Dashboard finance berisi tab earnings, withdraw, export, dan log, seluruhnya masih placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Login page for internal staff with Internet Identity, role workspace buttons, and superadmin claim logic.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal registration form capturing basic user info and role, showing a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/management/Management: Management dashboard with tabbed summary, GMV, margin, and statistics sections, all placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/manajer/ManajerDashbo: Manager dashboard with monitoring, approval, and log tabs, each currently showing placeholder content.
Partner login page with Internet Identity UI mock and navigation to workspace or registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Partner dashboard showing earnings summary and tabbed sections for profile, tasks, history, and wallet.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Partner registration form collecting basic info and showing a confirmation page after submission.
frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/Stra: Dashboard with tabbed sections for strategic partners, each showing a placeholder message and standard header/footer layout.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard featuring multiple tabs (user summary, status, audit, log) with placeholder content and a shared layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state and constraints, including requirements for implementing the superadmin-claim flow.
